knimeNode.name: Database Column Rename
knimeNode.shortDescription: Enables you to rename database column names.

fullDescription.intro: Rename database column names. The dialog allows you to change the name of individual columns by editing the text field. A configuration box with a red border indicates that the configured column does no longer exist.
fullDescription.option: Search specified columns from the column list.

Filter the column list. Available filters:
None: All columns are showed.
Modified: Only modified columns are showed.
Unmodified: Only unmodified columns are showed.
When the check box is selected, a new database column name can be given in the text field.
Used to remove the configuration box of the individual column.

ports.inPort: Database connection to the table whose column names should be renamed.
ports.outPort: Database connection to the table whose column names have been renamed.
